title: Silver tumbles 30 % below $80 after worst ever sell off triggered by liquidity wipeout
description: Silver price today: Silver’s parabolic rally ended in a violent crash on Friday, with prices plunging up to 30% in what traders called a historic liquidity wipeout. The sell-off came just a day after the metal hit record highs across global and domestic markets. A Fed-driven macro shock, overbought technicals and forced liquidation amplified the fall.
